TopicTitle: What Cola Name Would You Want?

Articles.Content:
Well not a quiz!

A game, you got to think of the most funniest (and hopefully creative) cola names ever.

Like fallout's Nuka-Cola drink it and EXPLOOOOODEEEEEE that's actually really good slogan.

My first one is...

Drum Roll Please...

Kerbal Cola, Drink it and become funny and jebediah style... Seriously you don't want to do that!!!!!!

Not too creative so you take it away.

Electric Delight

"Lost that creative "spark"? Drink Electric Delight!"

Edited September 1, 2014 by Flymetothemun

Electric Delight

"Lost that creative "spark"? Drink Electric Delight!"

Nice... Nice... Classic *No Sarcasm That's Actually Awesome I Ain't That Creative So That's Really Creative To Me A+ SIR Your going to wall street with your cola!*

Jeb's Coffee (reference to another forum game!)

Drink this, and you'll turn into a copy of Jeb. That explains how he regenerates!

Nice Ideas

Keep going, hey we can't possibly lose cola names now can we? lol.

Nice... Nice... Classic *No Sarcasm That's Actually Awesome I Ain't That Creative So That's Really Creative To Me A+ SIR Your going to wall street with your cola!*

Wall Street Cola

"Wall Street Cola: So good it helps the stock market!"
Eeloo-cola: So cool it freezes you!... Yea got it, its crap
i'm in for the "Inuit Cola" ... wut ? not enough consumers , ... i m not responsible of that you now know no ?...
